title: The Hush Sound - So Sudden (2005, 160kbps+)
description:
My personal favorite Hush Sound album! It&#039;s hard to impossible to find a torrent of this CD so I thought I would put one up for those who wanted it. All of the files are at least 160kbps.

Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/So-Sudden-Hush-Sound/dp/B000BCKFSO

1. City Traffic Puzzle
2. Weeping Willow
3. Crawling Towards the Sun
4. Artist
5. Unsafe Safe
6. Momentum
7. Hourglass
8. Echo
9. My Apologies
10. Market
11. Tides Change
12. Carry Me Home
13. Eileen
